values.value: All employees outside of the Warning Line system must be connected to a Fall Restraint system (1,000lb anchorage per person-does not allow for the user(s) to reach the fall hazard) or Fall Arrest system (5,000lb anchorage per person-limits free fall to 6ft or less) CFR 1926.502 (f)(2)
If employees are working less than 15 ft. from an unprotected edge, are proper conventional fall protection methods being utilized?
